title: What are kind of musical instruments are being invented today? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are almost all electronically generated, which opens up a whole universe of new “instruments.” Literally any sound that can be imagined can be produced in this way. Some will seem to be variations of existing acoustical instruments and some will be really their own entities. Many composers work with such creations regularly, including, in particular, film and other media composers and also composers of concert music. These are very exciting times for composers (and performers of keyboard and electronically-varied conventional instruments) with the availability of all this plus the traditional instruments. Your sonic imagination is the only limit, just as with visual imagination for computer-generated film makers.
